articles.title: How to stop being scared: Learning to love code
articles.description: Uncover the path to transforming fear of coding into a profound appreciation for the process and learn to embrace challenges and celebrate small victories along the way.

articles.title: Harmonizing skills: Bridging the gap between music and programming
articles.description: My observations on the fascinating parallels between studying music and learning to code, revealing how both disciplines nurture creativity, focus, and problem-solving skills while encouraging self-expression through structured frameworks.

articles.title: Every day is a school day: Making growth mindset a daily habit
articles.description: Learn how embracing a growth mindset transforms the learning process into an exciting pursuit, igniting the dopamine rush that comes with overcoming obstacles and exploring new skills.

articles.title: From Setlists to Sitemaps: Project Planning Tips for Creatives and Developers
articles.description: Lessons learned from planning music performances and redesigning websites, and how to manage creativity, timelines, and user needs effectively.

articles.title: The Future of Accessible Music Websites: Where Creativity Meets Inclusivity
articles.description: A speculation on emerging trends in accessible web design for musicians and performers, and the design practices that connect artistic expression and digital accessibility in an evolving industry.
